EdgeGateway.Title: EdgeGateway
EdgeGateway.MarkdownDocumentation:
**EdgeGateway** is a virtualized network appliance designed to provide secure connectivity, routing, and network services at the edge of a virtualized environment. It acts as a critical component for managing network traffic between internal virtual networks and external networks, such as the internet or remote sites.

### Key Features

- **Firewall:** Offers stateful firewall capabilities to control and secure traffic flows between different network segments.
- **NAT (Network Address Translation):** Supports source and destination NAT, enabling private internal networks to communicate with external networks.
- **VPN (Virtual Private Network):** Facilitates secure site-to-site and remote-access VPN connections for encrypted communications.
- **Load Balancing:** Distributes incoming network traffic across multiple servers or services to optimize resource utilization and improve availability.
- **DHCP Services:** Provides integrated DHCP services for connected networks.
- **Network Segmentation:** Enables the creation of multiple isolated networks within a virtual environment for enhanced security and compliance.

Create.short_documentation: CreateEdgeGateway creates a new edge gateway
Create.long_documentation: Create EdgeGateway performs a POST request to create a new edge gateway

params.name: owner_type
params.description: The type of the owner of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: Validates that the value is one of: `vdc`, `vdcgroup`.

params.name: owner_name
params.description: The name of the VDC or VDC Group that this edge gateway belongs to.

params.name: t0_name
params.description: The name of the T0 router that this edge gateway will be connected to.

params.name: bandwidth
params.description: The bandwidth limit in Mbps for the edge gateway. If t0 is SHARED, it must be one of the available values for the T0 router (Default value:  5Mbps). If t0 is DEDICATED, unlimited bandwidth is allowed.

Delete.long_documentation: Delete EdgeGateway performs a DELETE request to delete an edge gateway

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

Get.long_documentation: Get EdgeGateway performs a GET request to retrieve an edge gateway

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null., Validates that the value is a valid Edge Gateway name (tn01e02ocb0001234spt101)..

List.short_documentation: ListEdgeGateways retrieves a list of edge gateways
List.long_documentation: List EdgeGateways performs a GET request to retrieve a list of edge gateways

Update.long_documentation: Update EdgeGateway performs a PUT request to update an edge gateway

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

params.name: bandwidth
params.description: The new bandwidth limit in Mbps for the edge gateway. If t0 is SHARED, it must be one of the available values for the T0 router (Default value: 5Mbps). If t0 is DEDICATED, unlimited bandwidth is allowed.

CloudavenueServices.Title: CloudavenueServices
CloudavenueServices.MarkdownDocumentation: Manage Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway. Cloudavenue services is a network setting that allows the EdgeGateway to connect to the mutualized Cloud Avenue services (DNS, DHCP, etc.).

Disable.short_documentation: Disable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.
Disable.long_documentation: Disable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway. Cloudavenue services is a network setting that allows the EdgeGateway to connect to the mutualized Cloud Avenue services (DNS, DHCP, etc.).

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

Enable.short_documentation: Enable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.
Enable.long_documentation: Enable Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

Get.short_documentation: Retrieve Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway.
Get.long_documentation: Retrieve Cloud Avenue services on an EdgeGateway. This command returns the Cloud Avenue services available on the EdgeGateway, such as DNS, DHCP, and others.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

model.documentation: Network of the service in IP/CIDR format
Dedicated IP for the service in IP format (Used for the NAT to connect to the service)

Services.Title: Services
Services.MarkdownDocumentation:
**Services** are the services available on the EdgeGateway, such as load balancers, public IPs, and Cloud Avenue services.

## Key Features

 - **Load Balancers**: Retrieve information about load balancers configured on the EdgeGateway.
 - **Public IPs**: Get details about public IP addresses associated with the EdgeGateway.
 - **Cloud Avenue Services**: Access information about Cloud Avenue services available on the EdgeGateway.

Get.short_documentation: Retrieve services information about a specific EdgeGateway.
Get.long_documentation: Retrieve services information about a specific EdgeGateway. This command retrieves the network services available on the EdgeGateway, such as load balancers, public IPs, and Cloud Avenue services.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

model.documentation: Class of service for the load balancer
Network of the service in IP/CIDR format
Dedicated IP for the service in IP format (Used for the NAT to connect to the service)

T0.Title: T0
T0.MarkdownDocumentation: The **Tier0** (T0) router is a core networking component in CloudAvenue's ecosystem. It acts as the gateway between your private cloud networks and external networks, enabling north-south traffic flow, advanced routing, and connectivity to the internet.

Get.short_documentation: Get a specific T0 by name.
Get.long_documentation: Retrieve a specific T0 directly by its name or by the edge gateway it is associated with. This command allows you to fetch detailed information about a specific T0.

params.name: t0_name
params.description: The name of the T0 to retrieve.

params.name: edgegateway_id
params.description: The unique identifier of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `Name` is null., Validates that the value is a valid URN (`edgeGateway`)..

params.name: edgegateway_name
params.description: The name of the edge gateway.
params.validators_description: The value is required if the parameter `ID` is null.,

model.documentation: Class of service for the T0 router.
Total bandwidth capacity for the T0 router in Mbps. This is the maximum bandwidth that can be allocated to the T0 router. It is a limit imposed by the Class of Service.
Total bandwidth provisioned for the T0 router across all edge gateways in Mbps.
Remaining bandwidth that can be allocated to the edge gateways in Mbps. This is calculated as Capacity - Provisioned.
Allowed bandwidth values for the T0 router in Mbps. This is used to determine the available bandwidth options for the new edge gateway. If empty, no bandwidth remaining to allocate.
Indicates if unlimited bandwidth is allowed for the T0 router. This is true if the T0 router is DEDICATED.
Maximum number of edge gateways for the T0 router.
Unique identifier of the edge gateway. It is a URN that uniquely identifies the edge gateway.
Bandwidth allocated to the edge gateway in Mbps.
Allowed bandwidth values for the edge gateway in Mbps.

List.short_documentation: List all T0s available in the organization.
List.long_documentation: List all T0s available in the organization. This command retrieves a list of all T0s, which are the top-level network services in the Edge Gateway architecture.

model.documentation: Class of service for the T0 router.
Total bandwidth capacity for the T0 router in Mbps. This is the maximum bandwidth that can be allocated to the T0 router. It is a limit imposed by the Class of Service.
Total bandwidth provisioned for the T0 router across all edge gateways in Mbps.
Remaining bandwidth that can be allocated to the edge gateways in Mbps. This is calculated as Capacity - Provisioned.
Allowed bandwidth values for the T0 router in Mbps. This is used to determine the available bandwidth options for the new edge gateway. If empty, no bandwidth remaining to allocate.
Indicates if unlimited bandwidth is allowed for the T0 router. This is true if the T0 router is DEDICATED.
Maximum number of edge gateways for the T0 router.
Unique identifier of the edge gateway. It is a URN that uniquely identifies the edge gateway.
Bandwidth allocated to the edge gateway in Mbps.
Allowed bandwidth values for the edge gateway in Mbps.
